name: MaranBet
description: What is the project about? The platform MaranBet, where the token is used, is created for online betting on different sports events with the use of MARAN token. What makes your project unique? A various number of events on which people can place bets with MARAN token from football to cybersport, from hockey to MMA. History of your project. the platform was created in March, 2023. on the 23rd of March MARAN token was listed on Coinsbit Exchange. On the 29th of March there was opened an opportunity for staking MARAN tokens under the best percent. Whatâ€™s next for your project? Launching of SWAP on the platform for changing ERC-20 tokens to MARAN, creating exclusive bets, where people will be able to set a topic of betting themselves. Also there will be a lottery mechanism on the platform. What can your token be used for? for trading, staking and betting on the platform
